venue.name: Boston Center for the Arts - Cyclorama

item.description: Okay gals, I know there's still snow on the ground so it's hard to think this far ahead but spring will be arriving soon and with it comes the spring wine fest. If you buy your ticket by this Friday, it is only $29 versus the regular price of $69!!! I've been to other wine festivals in the past and they're a lot of fun. Check it out...http://www.bostoneventguide.com/events/swf.htm
item.name: Spring Wine Fest
